alert.note: Alert for Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 11:31PM CDT until June 14 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Northern Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... Western Garland County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... West central Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1131 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Norman, or 12 miles south of Mount Ida, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Mountain Pine... Meyers... Lake Ouachita State Park... Lofton... Rockwell... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Avant... Bonnerdale... Crystal Springs Landing... Sunshine... Welsh... Royal... Lena Landing Rec Area... Silver... Pettyview... Hempwallace... Pearcy... Crystal Springs... Hurricane Grove... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike
